data.title: Swedish-American Museums, Institutions and Organizations
data.text:
The Swedish heritage in America has been well preserved across the country. Here is a selection of museums, institutions and organizations.

The American-Scandinavian Foundation / Scandinavia House

New York, NY

www.amscan.org

www.scandinaviahouse.org

American Swedish Institute

Minneapolis, MN

www.asimn.org

Nordic Museum

Seattle, WA

www.nordicmuseum.org

Nordic Northwest | Nordia House

Portland, OR

www.nordicnorthwest.org/nordia-house

American-Swedish Historical Museum

Philadelphia, PA

www.americanswedish.org

Swedish American Museum

Chicago, IL

www.swedishamericanmuseum.org

Scandinavian Cultural Center

West Newton, MA

scandicenter.org

Swenson Swedish Immigration Research Center

Rock Island, IL

www.augustana.edu/swenson

Swedish Historical Society

Rockford, IL

www.swedishhistorical.org

SWEA

Various chapters around the US

https://swea.org

Swedish-American Chamber of Commerce USA (SACC-USA)

Washington, DC with chapters around the US

https://www.sacc-usa.org

Drott Lodge and Vasa Order of America

Washington, DC and other chapters around the US

www.drott-lodge.org

https://www.vasaorder.com

Swedish American Cultural Union (SACU)

Washington, DC

https://www.facebook.com/sacuevents

American Scandinavian Association (ASA)

Washington, DC

https://scandinavian-dc.org

The Swedish School of DC, MD, and VA (for children)

http://svenskaskolanwashingtondc.org

The Swedish School of DC, MD, and VA (for adults)

http://www.theswedishschool.org
